channel.title: Book Of Psalms on ✟ Christian Writings ✟
channel.description: Recent content in Book Of Psalms on ✟ Christian Writings ✟

item.title: Psalm 1
item.description: v1 Blessed is the man who doesn’t walk in the counsel of the wicked, nor stand on the path of sinners, nor sit in the seat of scoffers;

item.title: Psalm 2
item.description: v1 Why do the nations rage, and the peoples plot a vain thing?

item.title: Psalm 3
item.description: v1 Yahweh, how my adversaries have increased! Many are those who rise up against me.

item.title: Psalm 4
item.description: v1 Answer me when I call, God of my righteousness. Give me relief from my distress.

item.title: Psalm 5
item.description: v1 Give ear to my words, Yahweh. Consider my meditation.

item.title: Psalm 6
item.description: v1 Yahweh, don’t rebuke me in your anger, neither discipline me in your wrath.

item.title: Psalm 7
item.description: v1 Yahweh, my God, I take refuge in you. Save me from all those who pursue me, and deliver me,

item.title: Psalm 8
item.description: v1 Yahweh, our Lord, how majestic is your name in all the earth!

item.title: Psalm 9
item.description: v1 I will give thanks to Yahweh with my whole heart.

item.title: Psalm 10
item.description: v1 Why do you stand far off, Yahweh? Why do you hide yourself in times of trouble?

item.title: Psalm 11
item.description: v1 In Yahweh, I take refuge. How can you say to my soul, “Flee as a bird to your mountain”?

item.title: Psalm 12
item.description: v1 Help, Yahweh; for the godly man ceases. For the faithful fail from among the children of men.

item.title: Psalm 13
item.description: v1 How long, Yahweh? Will you forget me forever? How long will you hide your face from me?

item.title: Psalm 14
item.description: v1 The fool has said in his heart, “There is no God.

item.title: Psalm 15
item.description: v1 Yahweh, who shall dwell in your sanctuary? Who shall live on your holy hill?

item.title: Psalm 16
item.description: v1 Preserve me, God, for I take refuge in you.

item.title: Psalm 17
item.description: v1 Hear, Yahweh, my righteous plea. Give ear to my prayer that doesn’t go out of deceitful lips.

item.title: Psalm 18
item.description: v1 I love you, Yahweh, my strength. v2 Yahweh is my rock, my fortress, and my deliverer; my God, my rock, in whom I take refuge; my shield, and the horn of my salvation, my high tower.

item.title: Psalm 19
item.description: v1 The heavens declare the glory of God. The expanse shows his handiwork.

item.title: Psalm 20
item.description: v1 May Yahweh answer you in the day of trouble. May the name of the God of Jacob set you up on high,

item.title: Psalm 21
item.description: v1 The king rejoices in your strength, Yahweh! How greatly he rejoices in your salvation!

item.title: Psalm 22
item.description: v1 My God, my God, why have you forsaken me? Why are you so far from helping me, and from the words of my groaning?

item.title: Psalm 23
item.description: v1 Yahweh is my shepherd: I shall lack nothing. v2 He makes me lie down in green pastures.

item.title: Psalm 24
item.description: v1 The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell in it.

item.title: Psalm 25
item.description: v1 To you, Yahweh, I lift up my soul. v2 My God, I have trusted in you.

item.title: Psalm 26
item.description: v1 Judge me, Yahweh, for I have walked in my integrity.

item.title: Psalm 27
item.description: v1 Yahweh is my light and my salvation. Whom shall I fear?

item.title: Psalm 28
item.description: v1 To you, Yahweh, I call. My rock, don’t be deaf to me, lest, if you are silent to me, I would become like those who go down into the pit.

item.title: Psalm 29
item.description: v1 Ascribe to Yahweh, you sons of the mighty, ascribe to Yahweh glory and strength.

item.title: Psalm 30
item.description: v1 I will extol you, Yahweh, for you have raised me up, and have not made my foes to rejoice over me.

item.title: Psalm 31
item.description: v1 In you, Yahweh, I take refuge. Let me never be disappointed.

item.title: Psalm 32
item.description: v1 Blessed is he whose disobedience is forgiven, whose sin is covered.

item.title: Psalm 33
item.description: v1 Rejoice in Yahweh, you righteous! Praise is fitting for the upright.

item.title: Psalm 34
item.description: v1 I will bless Yahweh at all times. His praise will always be in my mouth.

item.title: Psalm 35
item.description: v1 Contend, Yahweh, with those who contend with me. Fight against those who fight against me.

item.title: Psalm 36
item.description: v1 A revelation is within my heart about the disobedience of the wicked: “There is no fear of God before his eyes.

item.title: Psalm 37
item.description: v1 Don’t fret because of evildoers, neither be envious against those who work unrighteousness.

item.title: Psalm 38
item.description: v1 Yahweh, don’t rebuke me in your wrath, neither chasten me in your hot displeasure.

item.title: Psalm 39
item.description: v1 I said, “I will watch my ways, so that I don’t sin with my tongue.

item.title: Psalm 40
item.description: v1 I waited patiently for Yahweh. He turned to me, and heard my cry.

item.title: Psalm 41
item.description: v1 Blessed is he who considers the poor. Yahweh will deliver him in the day of evil.

item.title: Psalm 42
item.description: v1 As the deer pants for the water brooks, so my soul pants after you, God.

item.title: Psalm 43
item.description: v1 Vindicate me, God, and plead my cause against an ungodly nation.

item.title: Psalm 44
item.description: v1 We have heard with our ears, God; our fathers have told us what work you did in their days, in the days of old.

item.title: Psalm 45
item.description: v1 My heart overflows with a noble theme. I recite my verses for the king.

item.title: Psalm 46
item.description: v1 God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.

item.title: Psalm 47
item.description: v1 Oh clap your hands, all you nations. Shout to God with the voice of triumph!

item.title: Psalm 48
item.description: v1 Great is Yahweh, and greatly to be praised, in the city of our God, in his holy mountain.

item.title: Psalm 49
item.description: v1 Hear this, all you peoples. Listen, all you inhabitants of the world,

item.title: Psalm 50
item.description: v1 The Mighty One, God, Yahweh, speaks, and calls the earth from sunrise to sunset.

item.title: Psalm 51
item.description: v1 Have mercy on me, God, according to your loving kindness.

item.title: Psalm 52
item.description: v1 Why do you boast of mischief, mighty man? God’s loving kindness endures continually.

item.title: Psalm 53
item.description: v1 The fool has said in his heart, “There is no God.

item.title: Psalm 54
item.description: v1 Save me, God, by your name. Vindicate me in your might.

item.title: Psalm 55
item.description: v1 Listen to my prayer, God. Don’t hide yourself from my supplication.

item.title: Psalm 56
item.description: v1 Be merciful to me, God, for man wants to swallow me up.

item.title: Psalm 57
item.description: v1 Be merciful to me, God, be merciful to me, for my soul takes refuge in you.

item.title: Psalm 58
item.description: v1 Do you indeed speak righteousness, silent ones? Do you judge blamelessly, you sons of men?

item.title: Psalm 59
item.description: v1 Deliver me from my enemies, my God. Set me on high from those who rise up against me.

item.title: Psalm 60
item.description: v1 God, you have rejected us. You have broken us down.

item.title: Psalm 61
item.description: v1 Hear my cry, God. Listen to my prayer. v2 From the end of the earth, I will call to you when my heart is overwhelmed.

item.title: Psalm 62
item.description: v1 My soul rests in God alone. My salvation is from him.

item.title: Psalm 63
item.description: v1 God, you are my God. I will earnestly seek you.

item.title: Psalm 64
item.description: v1 Hear my voice, God, in my complaint. Preserve my life from fear of the enemy.

item.title: Psalm 65
item.description: v1 Praise waits for you, God, in Zion. Vows shall be performed to you.

item.title: Psalm 66
item.description: v1 Make a joyful shout to God, all the earth!

item.title: Psalm 67
item.description: v1 May God be merciful to us, bless us, and cause his face to shine on us.

item.title: Psalm 68
item.description: v1 Let God arise! Let his enemies be scattered! Let them who hate him also flee before him.

item.title: Psalm 69
item.description: v1 Save me, God, for the waters have come up to my neck!

item.title: Psalm 70
item.description: v1 Hurry, God, to deliver me. Come quickly to help me, Yahweh.

item.title: Psalm 71
item.description: v1 In you, Yahweh, I take refuge. Never let me be disappointed.

item.title: Psalm 72
item.description: v1 God, give the king your justice; your righteousness to the royal son.

item.title: Psalm 73
item.description: v1 Surely God is good to Israel, to those who are pure in heart.

item.title: Psalm 74
item.description: v1 God, why have you rejected us forever? Why does your anger smolder against the sheep of your pasture?

item.title: Psalm 75
item.description: v1 We give thanks to you, God. We give thanks, for your Name is near.

item.title: Psalm 76
item.description: v1 In Judah, God is known. His name is great in Israel.

item.title: Psalm 77
item.description: v1 My cry goes to God! Indeed, I cry to God for help, and for him to listen to me.

item.title: Psalm 78
item.description: v1 Hear my teaching, my people. Turn your ears to the words of my mouth.

item.title: Psalm 79
item.description: v1 God, the nations have come into your inheritance. They have defiled your holy temple.

item.title: Psalm 80
item.description: v1 Hear us, Shepherd of Israel, you who lead Joseph like a flock, you who sit above the cherubim, shine out.

item.title: Psalm 81
item.description: v1 Sing aloud to God, our strength! Make a joyful shout to the God of Jacob!

item.title: Psalm 82
item.description: v1 God presides in the great assembly. He judges among the gods.

item.title: Psalm 83
item.description: v1 God, don’t keep silent. Don’t keep silent, and don’t be still, God.

item.title: Psalm 84
item.description: v1 How lovely are your dwellings, Yahweh of Armies! v2 My soul longs, and even faints for the courts of Yahweh.

item.title: Psalm 85
item.description: v1 Yahweh, you have been favorable to your land. You have restored the fortunes of Jacob.

item.title: Psalm 86
item.description: v1 Hear, Yahweh, and answer me, for I am poor and needy.

item.title: Psalm 87
item.description: v1 His foundation is in the holy mountains. v2 Yahweh loves the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.

item.title: Psalm 88
item.description: v1 Yahweh, the God of my salvation, I have cried day and night before you.

item.title: Psalm 89
item.description: v1 I will sing of the loving kindness of Yahweh forever.

item.title: Psalm 90
item.description: v1 Lord, you have been our dwelling place for all generations.

item.title: Psalm 91
item.description: v1 He who dwells in the secret place of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty.

item.title: Psalm 92
item.description: v1 It is a good thing to give thanks to Yahweh, to sing praises to your name, Most High,

item.title: Psalm 93
item.description: v1 Yahweh reigns! He is clothed with majesty! Yahweh is armed with strength.

item.title: Psalm 94
item.description: v1 Yahweh, you God to whom vengeance belongs, you God to whom vengeance belongs, shine out.

item.title: Psalm 95
item.description: v1 Oh come, let’s sing to Yahweh. Let’s shout aloud to the rock of our salvation!

item.title: Psalm 96
item.description: v1 Sing to Yahweh a new song! Sing to Yahweh, all the earth.

item.title: Psalm 97
item.description: v1 Yahweh reigns! Let the earth rejoice! Let the multitude of islands be glad!

item.title: Psalm 98
item.description: v1 Sing to Yahweh a new song, for he has done marvelous things!

item.title: Psalm 99
item.description: v1 Yahweh reigns! Let the peoples tremble. He sits enthroned among the cherubim.

item.title: Psalm 100
item.description: v1 Shout for joy to Yahweh, all you lands! v2 Serve Yahweh with gladness.

item.title: Psalm 101
item.description: v1 I will sing of loving kindness and justice. To you, Yahweh, I will sing praises.

item.title: Psalm 102
item.description: v1 Hear my prayer, Yahweh! Let my cry come to you.

item.title: Psalm 103
item.description: v1 Praise Yahweh, my soul! All that is within me, praise his holy name!

item.title: Psalm 104
item.description: v1 Bless Yahweh, my soul. Yahweh, my God, you are very great.

item.title: Psalm 105
item.description: v1 Give thanks to Yahweh! Call on his name! Make his doings known among the peoples.

item.title: Psalm 106
item.description: v1 Praise Yahweh! Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loving kindness endures forever.

item.title: Psalm 107
item.description: v1 Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loving kindness endures forever.

item.title: Psalm 108
item.description: v1 My heart is steadfast, God. I will sing and I will make music with my soul.

item.title: Psalm 109
item.description: v1 God of my praise, don’t remain silent, v2 for they have opened the mouth of the wicked and the mouth of deceit against me.

item.title: Psalm 110
item.description: v1 Yahweh says to my Lord, “Sit at my right hand, until I make your enemies your footstool for your feet.

item.title: Psalm 111
item.description: v1 Praise Yah! I will give thanks to Yahweh with my whole heart, in the council of the upright, and in the congregation.

item.title: Psalm 112
item.description: v1 Praise Yah! Blessed is the man who fears Yahweh, who delights greatly in his commandments.

item.title: Psalm 113
item.description: v1 Praise Yah! Praise, you servants of Yahweh, praise Yahweh’s name.

item.title: Psalm 114
item.description: v1 When Israel went out of Egypt, the house of Jacob from a people of foreign language,

item.title: Psalm 115
item.description: v1 Not to us, Yahweh, not to us, but to your name give glory, for your loving kindness, and for your truth’s sake.

item.title: Psalm 116
item.description: v1 I love Yahweh, because he listens to my voice, and my cries for mercy.

item.title: Psalm 117
item.description: v1 Praise Yahweh, all you nations! Extol him, all you peoples!

item.title: Psalm 118
item.description: v1 Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loving kindness endures forever.

item.title: Psalm 119
item.description: v1 Blessed are those whose ways are blameless, who walk according to Yahweh’s law.

item.title: Psalm 120
item.description: v1 In my distress, I cried to Yahweh. He answered me.

item.title: Psalm 121
item.description: v1 I will lift up my eyes to the hills. Where does my help come from?

item.title: Psalm 122
item.description: v1 I was glad when they said to me, “Let’s go to Yahweh’s house!

item.title: Psalm 123
item.description: v1 I lift up my eyes to you, you who sit in the heavens.

item.title: Psalm 124
item.description: v1 If it had not been Yahweh who was on our side, let Israel now say,

item.title: Psalm 125
item.description: v1 Those who trust in Yahweh are as Mount Zion, which can’t be moved, but remains forever.

item.title: Psalm 126
item.description: v1 When Yahweh brought back those who returned to Zion, we were like those who dream.

item.title: Psalm 127
item.description: v1 Unless Yahweh builds the house, they who build it labor in vain.

item.title: Psalm 128
item.description: v1 Blessed is everyone who fears Yahweh, who walks in his ways.

item.title: Psalm 129
item.description: v1 Many times they have afflicted me from my youth up.

item.title: Psalm 130
item.description: v1 Out of the depths I have cried to you, Yahweh.

item.title: Psalm 131
item.description: v1 Yahweh, my heart isn’t arrogant, nor my eyes lofty; nor do I concern myself with great matters, or things too wonderful for me.

item.title: Psalm 132
item.description: v1 Yahweh, remember David and all his affliction, v2 how he swore to Yahweh, and vowed to the Mighty One of Jacob:

item.title: Psalm 133
item.description: v1 See how good and how pleasant it is for brothers to live together in unity!

item.title: Psalm 134
item.description: v1 Look! Praise Yahweh, all you servants of Yahweh, who stand by night in Yahweh’s house!

item.title: Psalm 135
item.description: v1 Praise Yah! Praise Yahweh’s name! Praise him, you servants of Yahweh,

item.title: Psalm 136
item.description: v1 Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good; for his loving kindness endures forever.

item.title: Psalm 137
item.description: v1 By the rivers of Babylon, there we sat down. Yes, we wept, when we remembered Zion.

item.title: Psalm 138
item.description: v1 I will give you thanks with my whole heart. Before the gods, I will sing praises to you.

item.title: Psalm 139
item.description: v1 Yahweh, you have searched me, and you know me.

item.title: Psalm 140
item.description: v1 Deliver me, Yahweh, from the evil man. Preserve me from the violent man:

item.title: Psalm 141
item.description: v1 Yahweh, I have called on you. Come to me quickly!

item.title: Psalm 142
item.description: v1 I cry with my voice to Yahweh. With my voice, I ask Yahweh for mercy.

item.title: Psalm 143
item.description: v1 Hear my prayer, Yahweh. Listen to my petitions. In your faithfulness and righteousness, relieve me.

item.title: Psalm 144
item.description: v1 Blessed be Yahweh, my rock, who teaches my hands to war, and my fingers to battle:

item.title: Psalm 145
item.description: v1 I will exalt you, my God, the King. I will praise your name forever and ever.

item.title: Psalm 146
item.description: v1 Praise Yah! Praise Yahweh, my soul. v2 While I live, I will praise Yahweh.

item.title: Psalm 147
item.description: v1 Praise Yah, for it is good to sing praises to our God; for it is pleasant and fitting to praise him.

item.title: Psalm 148
item.description: v1 Praise Yah! Praise Yahweh from the heavens! Praise him in the heights!

item.title: Psalm 149
item.description: v1 Praise Yahweh! Sing to Yahweh a new song, his praise in the assembly of the saints.

item.title: Psalm 150
item.description: v1 Praise Yah! Praise God in his sanctuary! Praise him in his heavens for his acts of power!
